EmailTemplate.description: Email sent to the client who sent the email booking to confirm that the email has been received. For emails to TES International.
EmailTemplate.name: TES International: Email Received Alert
EmailTemplate.subject: We have received your email
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Opportunity.Order_By__c},
Thank you for your email and for your interest in recruiting with TES. One of our recruitment specialists will contact you shortly.
If you have any further questions about your recruitment campaign, please don’t hesitate to call the team on 020 3194 3080, Monday to Friday, 9am to 5pm (excluding bank holidays).
Thank you for choosing TES. We look forward to helping you recruit the best.
Best regards
Michelle Reid
Commercial Director – TES International
